website_summaries.verdict: These adjustable hurdles are versatile enough to suit a variety of users and workouts, and they won't break if stepped on.
pros: 6 hurdles that adjust to 6-inch, 9-inch or 12-inch heights
Breakaway design keeps hurdles from cracking if they're stepped on
cons: These hurdles are very lightweight and may tip over in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a great product. I'm a dog trainer and take these ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great product. I'm a dog trainer and take these to appointments. They are light and easily portable in the bag provided for them. They might actually be too light. They easily topple at the slightest nudge. I will say they are adaptable I've used them in grass and on concrete , carpet and hardfloor. I love the height adjustment. The only reason I give 4/5 is because I often have to provide them stability when working with my dogs. My daughter who is 4 also really enjoys playing with them :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Broke during second use *Updated*
customer_reviews.text: I thebought this item because it was adjustable and listed as being durable. It is described as having a breakaway system that allows it to withstand being accidentally stepped on. Well, during the second use, two of the hurdles broke when accidentally stepped on by my 4 year old and my 6 year old while they were running playing/exercising with my supervision. The hurdles did not breakaway, but just broke with yellow plastic pieces in the joint breaking off. Not good!!! I would not recommend this product. *Update* The company quickly responded with concern and promptly replaced it with a new set. Their concern shows their intent on providing a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Boutell

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: These hurdles have an amazing concept. They are lightweight, portable, adjustable, and have the potential to be the best training hurdles on the market. All 6 hurdles fit neatly into a small carrying bag that can be thrown in any gym bag. After a slight issue with a hurdle, I was given lightning fast customer service to resolve the issue. Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.author: Swissing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hurdles for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These hurdles are good quality and work as they claim. Very easy to setup and take down. They store easily the bag that comes with the hurdles. They are very lightweight and collapse easily with contact, so they should hold up to contact. I can imagine the plastic would snap if too much abuse though. Very portable and sets up with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company with super customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally had an issue with one a couple of the agility ladders but after writing them they promptly sent me a replacement pack. Now, this is great customer service! They're working on making the product perfect but in the interim, as they stated to me, they will replace any hurdles that break. Awesome company with true value and love of their customers!
customer_reviews.author: Peter X.M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, fast and fun physical activity for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of QUICKPLAY PRO adjustable height hurdles to use in my martial arts classes for agility training. My order arrived sooner than expected and the product performs as promised. My students (4-17yrs) love the new obstacles and the adjustable height makes it easy for use with students of all ages. We did have one hurdle break on the first use but EXCELLENT customer service from QUICKPLAY PRO replaced the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hurdles
customer_reviews.text: Love these hurdles for training my daughter. She plays soccer so we do agility work. I wasn’t sure how well these would stand in grass that’s not always cut short and these things more than delivered! Light weight but never felt like they would fall over. Another nice feature is the ease of adjusting. Portability is top-notch as well. Get these
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: These are great, easy to set up, multiple height options. Very durable, mine have been landed on numerous times and have not broken. They are designed so the legs pop off, but are easy to put back together. Just wish there were 2 more in the set. I don't need 12 so I wouldn't want to buy two sets, but some of the drills we do would work better with 8 hurdles.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as stated in the description. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as durable as stated in the description. My 5 year old landed on one, causing the corner to snap off. I've had zero success getting any assistance from Quickplay regarding the replacement of the hurdle. I sent countless emails, heard nothing back. Who handles the customer service, Quick play or Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.  Expensive for what they actually cost
customer_reviews.text: These are a good product, but they didnt work as well in the grass which is where i used them to train for football. instead of collapsing they would just snap. They got me through a season (2 sets) and did thier job but i will prob look for a different style next time.
customer_reviews.author: b_hall

customer_reviews.title: I have a variety of abilities in my class so the standard hurdles are fine but I actually really love these
customer_reviews.text: I am a boot camp instructor and I was looking for some hurdles for class. I have a variety of abilities in my class so the standard hurdles are fine but I actually really love these! I have only tried them out in my kitchen so far, but I did land on one and it just gave out under me. No breaking. No tripping. Easy snap up and down to change the levels. Great carrying case too! I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought one set for one of our kids and ended up buying another one for the second one. It is easy to set up and down and light weight. 2 of the stands on the second one came broken, and I contacted the company and they replaced it right away. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pthomas

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my three year old mini schnauzer, but I think it will be awhile before she will use them the way I want her to. She wants to crawl under them now or go around them to get her treat! The one year old schnauzer refuses to try it at all! I like that they are easy to store when not in use. They don't get enough outdoor exercise during our Wisconsin winters so I am hoping they cooperate soon!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Bethke

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable, falls over easily
customer_reviews.text: These are great as far as easy to setup and store/carry... but they aren’t very stable if used in grass or if there’s a strong breeze. They easily blow over and are difficult to get to stay upright in the grass. Prob would be great on a field.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Good product, comes in a nice carry bag to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a set for small training multi sport group of teens. Good product, comes in a nice carry bag to keep it organized. Hurdles are quick and simple to setup into the various heights. The joints click into place and stay locked. The feet are on the smallish side but hurdles seem fairly stable. Tested the hurdles by stepping on them and they collapsed as designed and simply snap them back into their height.
customer_reviews.author: Hien

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rehab
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hurdles for Physical Therapy setting. These hurdles are perfect not only for rehabbing athletes, but are even better for gait training after injuries/surgeries or balance training for the elderly. Because of the "break away" feature, these patient with compromised balance are a lot safer than the cones that are usually used in rehab settings. The do not become trip hazards once they are stepped on like the cones do once they are knocked over. the quick adjustment feature allows for on the fly challenges with various heights.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I like the way they collapse instead of flip as it seems safer and less likely to get injured in the event of a fall.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsierose01

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy, safe
customer_reviews.text: Trying to figure out why these haven’t been around for longer. Such a simple concept and they save so much time, space, etc. I use these for small groups of athletes and adult clients alike who have varying levels of fitness. Super quick to set up and take down. AND with the number one goal being injury prevention, the feature that allows them to flatten down/easily snap apart if stepped on is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Love books!

customer_reviews.title: Use for Physical Therapy Patients
customer_reviews.text: I work with many neuro patients and needed hurdles that wouldn’t be a trip hazard if the patient couldn’t make their foot over hurdle completely. They collapse down safely, set up is quick and quite durable. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sassychick

customer_reviews.title: awesome seller amazingly fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: awesome seller amazingly fast shipping, i use it for my dog to learn agility, must less expensive than dog training equipment and much stronger too thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far we’ve had it for about a month, taken it out for my daughter and her friends to jump over them, sometimes they jumped on them... just came apart and we put them together and went back to jumping! Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ougm

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for easy at home crossfit workouts. I was satisfied with what I received especially for the price. I like the adjustable height option. The only thing I was a little dissapointed in was that they didn't weigh much so it was sometimes hard to keep them standing on grass. Overall it is a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lynn Duke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, especially for teams on the go. Also had great experience with customer service department. These folks are top notch!
customer_reviews.author: DrewF

customer_reviews.title: Versital and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love the adjustable height option and warranty with this product! My 8 year old daughter can set them up by herself and use the lower levels plus we can also use them at the highest level for my 12 and 14 year old! Genius!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. DeSutter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These hurdles have been great to use and my soccer team loves them. The collapse is very nice as they get stepped on from time to time. They collapse rather than break. The ability to adjust the height 3 different levels makes a difference as well. Not needing to buy other hurdles for different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Nava

customer_reviews.title: Agility training aid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a training tool for my U8 soccer team. I run them through some agility training, first time through laying flat then adjusted up to 6” and then up to1’. One kid stomped it and an arm cane off. It just snaps back on. Perfect tool for hurdles for the kids. These will work for the older kids as well.
customer_reviews.author: scott huffman

customer_reviews.title: versatile and a good price. I've had them stomped on
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about 6 months. Durable, versatile and a good price. I've had them stomped on, kicked and they are still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Y.

customer_reviews.title: easy setup and use
customer_reviews.text: They are so easy to setup and use, and very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Lascano

customer_reviews.title: Variety of Heights very useful
customer_reviews.text: I find these very portable and the variable heights are useful as I work with Parkinson's Disease patients. The fact they just collapse when stepped on rather than breaking is really great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable functionality
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Nice adjustable functionality, fold down nice and compact. CONS: A little bit wobbly. Natural trade-off for their light weight and adjustability I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Women's soccer team training
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Women's soccer team training! Sturdy and flexible. Doesn't stand well on a windy day, but that's easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla M. G. Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Love these hurdles
customer_reviews.text: Love these hurdles, I have a 5yr old and a 13yr old, they can both use these with out fear of getting injured. They are light weight and fold for easy storage in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: cldk

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described. Easy to setup and very durable. Hurdles have stepped on multiple times and are holding up well. Definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Rueger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for my 8 and 6 year olds to set up. Adjustable height is great and durable enough for or me to accidentally land on them.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: easy set up and take
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, well put together, easy set up and take down
customer_reviews.author: JEP

customer_reviews.title: It is nice because the hurdles are adjustable in size and stack ...
customer_reviews.text: I am physical therapist and we use these in our clinic. It is nice because the hurdles are adjustable in size and stack together well! A great buy :) Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic- To Flimsy Dont Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was sold on the fact you could adjust them to different heights but regret the purchase due to how flimsy and cheap they are. If a player barely skims the hurdle with their foot they fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: stephen g kish

customer_reviews.title: What was expected
customer_reviews.text: These hurdles are pretty cool. The adjustable size is great you can use them as a little goal to kick a soccer ball through, or just as hurdles for any age player.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable, but light weight and easy to transport. Come apart with little coaxing. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jcordeni

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Using it to train my dog. Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy F

customer_reviews.title: Faster feet in Soccer is always a good thing and these hurdles will help achieve that goal
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly. Faster feet in Soccer is always a good thing and these hurdles will help achieve that goal.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritBearMom

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing purchase and price. Durability is just as amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Received as expected. Product works just as advertised. I would recommend these for quickness and agility training. 3 more words.
customer_reviews.author: ksy177

customer_reviews.title: The best Hurdles ever.
customer_reviews.text: Nice 👍 product, easy to adjusted different heights. I used them in different training drills
customer_reviews.author: Luis u loreto

customer_reviews.title: Good but one hurdle was broken
customer_reviews.text: Product is good however mine came with one of the hinges broken on one of the hurdles, would like to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great hurdles with adjustable height
customer_reviews.text: Great hurdles with adjustable height. However, if you jump on them - brake very quick. My last for few month only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Hurdles in the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to setup! Easy to put away! Easy to carry! Love the carrying bag! I'm now a big fan of QUICKPLAY PRO!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these hudles
customer_reviews.text: Fully satisfied with product >> light, portable and sturdy. Had these for few years and still going.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! Product is compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described, ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help my daughters ad teammates with their soccer workouts. Ordered one set, they worked as advertised, so I ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.author: HKP in Honolulu

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality didn’t even last 1 week plastic here it folds is like paper
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Use it for basketball to maneuver and do dribbling drills. Great portability and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K.

customer_reviews.title: these are not as "break proof" as I had hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: these are not as "break proof" as I had hoped, in fact while demonstrating their durability by stepping on one, it snapped lol
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need! Quick setup makes these a perfect part of my training.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Podbielski

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great and its a cool concept but it lasted for about 2 practices with 7-9 year olds. Easily broke at the base and at the hinges. UDPATE. Customer service quickly replaced tge broken pieces. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two packs and both work great; durable, lightweight, fast/easy setup and pack-up.
customer_reviews.author: edgar juarez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and don't break when my clients step on em!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Williams

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: The idea of adjustable hurdle height is great, but these broke very easily!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability and the ability to adjust the height of the hurdle. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Beware: easily breaks
customer_reviews.text: These are made of a much too brittle plastic, so when accidentally clipped or stepped on by kids, they break. Several of the them were broken and cracked by my second practice, and of course I waited and missed the return window. Very disappointing product and definitely not for youth soccer players.
customer_reviews.author: Feral_Man

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Looking for more higher options though
customer_reviews.text: Works as described! I love it! Looking for more higher options though!
customer_reviews.author: wiz8ser

product_meta.title: QUICKPLAY PRO Adjustable Height: 6", 9" + 12" The Original All-in-One Speed Hurdles (Set of 6) Speed Training Hurdles, Agility Hurdles and Plyometric Hurdles
feature_bullets: Do not accept imitations - The original QUICKPLAY PRO Quick-Click Adjustable Height Speed Hurdle - Set of 6. Why carry around heavy and bulky single height hurdles when you can Quick-Click? 3 HEIGHT SETTINGS (6, 9 & 12 inches) Adjust each individual hurdle height instead of having to carry around bulky and heavy equipment.

INSTANTLY INCREASE & LOWER TRAINING INTENSITY with the innovative QUICKPLAY Quick-Click mechanism. To change the height of each hurdle simply rotate the feet until they Click in place no tricky buttons or clips. LOW CATCH TOP BAR DESIGN Featuring our unique dog-bone rung shape and beveled edges to minimize being caught by the athletes foot.

SUPERIOR VISUAL ACUITY Bright neon color provides superior visual acuity training than other hurdle colors. TRAIN ON ALL SURFACES Safe to use on most training surfaces including gym floors, artificial turf, concrete, asphalt and grass
ULTRA PORTABLE & EASY TO STORE Train anywhere with its super lightweight design that packs down smaller than any other hurdle on the market!

QUALITY & DURABILITY BACKED BY OUR INDUSTRY LEADING 2 YEAR WARRANTY Designed in the UK by athletes, for athletes, the QUICKPLAY PRO Quick-Click Hurdles feature a flexible, durable design and a unique breakaway mechanism to reduce the chance of damage if they are stepped on in training, unlike other hurdles on the market that can break or fly off in any direction. To reassemble the hurdle simply click it back into place.
